1.name: Spider-Man
1.description: When bitten by a genetically modified spider, a nerdy, shy, and awkward high school student gains spider-like abilities that he eventually must use to fight evil as a superhero after tragedy befalls his family.

2.name: Gangs of New York
2.description: In 1862, Amsterdam Vallon returns to the Five Points area of New York City seeking revenge against Bill the Butcher, his father's killer.

3.name: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
3.description: An ancient prophecy seems to be coming true when a mysterious presence begins stalking the corridors of a school of magic and leaving its victims paralyzed.

4.name: Road to Perdition
4.description: A mob enforcer's son witnesses a murder, forcing him and his father to take to the road, and his father down a path of redemption and revenge.

5.name: Catch Me If You Can
5.description: A seasoned FBI agent pursues Frank Abagnale Jr. who, before his 19th birthday, successfully forged millions of dollars' worth of checks while posing as a Pan Am pilot, a doctor, and a legal prosecutor.

6.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
6.description: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

7.name: Minority Report
7.description: In a future where a special police unit is able to arrest murderers before they commit their crimes, an officer from that unit is himself accused of a future murder.

8.name: Blade II
8.description: Blade forms an uneasy alliance with the vampire council in order to combat the Reapers, who are feeding on vampires.

9.name: 28 Days Later...
9.description: Four weeks after a mysterious, incurable virus spreads throughout the UK, a handful of survivors try to find sanctuary.

10.name: Cidade de Deus
10.description: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

11.name: Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones
11.description: Ten years after initially meeting, Anakin Skywalker shares a forbidden romance with Padmé Amidala, while Obi-Wan Kenobi investigates an assassination attempt on the senator and discovers a secret clone army crafted for the Jedi.

12.name: The Pianist
12.description: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

13.name: Scooby-Doo
13.description: After an acrimonious break up, the Mystery Inc. gang are individually brought to an island resort to investigate strange goings on.

14.name: Men in Black II
14.description: Agent J is sent to find Agent K and restore his memory after the re-appearance of a case from K's past.

15.name: The Count of Monte Cristo
15.description: A young man, falsely imprisoned by his jealous "friend", escapes and uses a hidden treasure to exact his revenge.

16.name: The Bourne Identity
16.description: A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory.

17.name: Unfaithful
17.description: A New York suburban couple's marriage goes dangerously awry when the wife indulges in an adulterous fling.

18.name: Irréversible
18.description: Events over the course of one traumatic night in Paris unfold in reverse-chronological order as the beautiful Alex is brutally raped and beaten by a stranger in the underpass.

19.name: About a Boy
19.description: A cynical, immature young man is taught how to act like a grown-up by a little boy.

20.name: Signs
20.description: A family living on a farm finds mysterious crop circles in their fields which suggests something more frightening to come.

21.name: Red Dragon
21.description: A retired FBI agent with psychological gifts is assigned to help track down "The Tooth Fairy", a mysterious serial killer. Aiding him is imprisoned forensic psychiatrist Dr. Hannibal "The Cannibal" Lecter.

22.name: Chicago
22.description: Two death-row murderesses develop a fierce rivalry while competing for publicity, celebrity, and a sleazy lawyer's attention.

23.name: 8 Mile
23.description: A young rapper, struggling with every aspect of his life, wants to make it big but his friends and foes make this odyssey of rap harder than it may seem.

24.name: Equilibrium
24.description: In an oppressive future where all forms of feeling are illegal, a man in charge of enforcing the law rises to overthrow the system and state.

25.name: The Ring
25.description: A journalist must investigate a mysterious videotape which seems to cause the death of anyone one week to the day after they view it.

26.name: Reign of Fire
26.description: A brood of fire-breathing dragons emerges from the earth and begins setting everything ablaze, establishing dominance over the planet.

27.name: Lilo & Stitch
27.description: A Hawaiian girl adopts an unusual pet who is actually a notorious extra-terrestrial fugitive.

28.name: A Walk to Remember
28.description: The story of two North Carolina teens, Landon Carter and Jamie Sullivan, who are thrown together after Landon gets into trouble and is made to do community service.

29.name: Secretary
29.description: A young woman, recently released from a mental hospital, gets a job as a secretary to a demanding lawyer, where their employer-employee relationship turns into a sexual, sadomasochistic one.

30.name: Ghost Ship
30.description: A salvage crew discovers a long-lost 1962 passenger ship floating lifeless in a remote region of the Bering Sea, and soon notices that its long-dead inhabitants may still be on board.

31.name: Austin Powers in Goldmember
31.description: Upon learning that his father has been kidnapped, Austin Powers must travel to 1975 and defeat the aptly named villain Goldmember, who is working with Dr. Evil.

32.name: We Were Soldiers
32.description: The story of the first major battle of the American phase of the Vietnam War, and the soldiers on both sides that fought it, while their wives wait nervously and anxiously at home for the good news or the bad news.

33.name: Sweet Home Alabama
33.description: A young woman who's reinvented herself as a New York City socialite must return home to Alabama to obtain a divorce from her husband, after seven years of separation.

34.name: Resident Evil
34.description: A special military unit fights a powerful, out-of-control supercomputer and hundreds of scientists who have mutated into flesh-eating creatures after a laboratory accident.

35.name: Punch-Drunk Love
35.description: A psychologically troubled novelty supplier is nudged towards a romance with an English woman, all the while being extorted by a phone-sex line run by a crooked mattress salesman, and purchasing stunning amounts of pudding.

36.name: Die Another Day
36.description: James Bond is sent to investigate the connection between a North Korean terrorist and a diamond mogul, who is funding the development of an international space weapon.

37.name: The Hours
37.description: The story of how the novel "Mrs. Dalloway" affects three generations of women, all of whom, in one way or another, have had to deal with suicide in their lives.

38.name: Ice Age
38.description: Set during the Ice Age, a sabertooth tiger, a sloth, and a wooly mammoth find a lost human infant, and they try to return him to his tribe.

39.name: Panic Room
39.description: A divorced woman and her diabetic daughter take refuge in their newly-purchased house's safe room, when three men break-in, searching for a missing fortune.

40.name: Insomnia
40.description: Two Los Angeles homicide detectives are dispatched to a northern town where the sun doesn't set to investigate the methodical murder of a local teen.

41.name: xXx
41.description: An extreme sports athlete, Xander Cage, is recruited by the government on a special mission.

42.name: Bend It Like Beckham
42.description: The daughter of orthodox Sikh rebels against her parents' traditionalism and joins a football team.

43.name: The Scorpion King
43.description: A desert warrior rises up against the evil army that is destroying his homeland. He captures the enemy's key sorcerer, takes her deep into the desert and prepares for a final showdown.

44.name: The Rules of Attraction
44.description: The incredibly spoiled and overprivileged students of Camden College are a backdrop for an unusual love triangle between a drug dealer, a virgin and a bisexual classmate.

45.name: Treasure Planet
45.description: A Disney animated version of "Treasure Island". The only difference is that the film is set in outer space with alien worlds and other galactic wonders.

46.name: Frida
46.description: A biography of artist Frida Kahlo, who channeled the pain of a crippling injury and her tempestuous marriage into her work.

47.name: Ali G Indahouse
47.description: Ali G unwittingly becomes a pawn in the Chancellor's plot to overthrow the Prime Minister of Great Britain. However, Ali is embraced by the nation as a voice of the youth, making the PM and his government more popular than ever.

48.name: The Time Machine
48.description: Hoping to alter the events of the past, a 19th century inventor instead travels 800,000 years into the future, where he finds humankind divided into two warring races.

49.name: Ken Park
49.description: Ken Park is about several Californian skateboarders' lives and relationships with and without their parents.

50.name: My Big Fat Greek Wedding
50.description: A young Greek woman falls in love with a non-Greek and struggles to get her family to accept him while she comes to terms with her heritage and cultural identity.
